title: Interpretation of seeing figs in a dream according to Ibn Sirin’s interpretation

preview.html: Interpretation of seeing figs in a dream According to Ibn Sirin’s interpretation, dreams are interpreted in different ways and meanings depending on the condition of the viewer, his personality, and the important and pivotal issues in real life that occur at the time the dreams appear. Because dreams are part of the subconscious mind and the mind and body interact with them as if they were reality during the hours of sleep, it may Many scholars were interested in developing an explanation to remove their ambiguity and clarify it. An article that we will learn together about the interpretation of seeing eating figs in a dream according to Ibn Sirin’s interpretation. Interpretation of dreams to see figs in a dream. Interpretation of Ibn Sirin. The scholar Ibn Sirin pointed out that figs in a dream indicate a lot of goodness, livelihood and money, and he comes from lawful money after a lot of effort, and profits from Trade, and mentioning what God Almighty mentioned in His Beloved Book, and for these. Figs are good and their blessings come from God Almighty. Whoever dreams that he brings figs to his home, this vision indicates that the opinion will be rich later, and whoever sees himself eating figs in a dream, this indicates happiness, and whoever sees in his dream that someone gives him. . Figure: This vision indicates the achievement of many goals and aspirations. And the desires that the opinion wants.If a fig tree appears in a dream, whether to a man or a single or married woman, this indicates that an unmarried girl will soon marry a generous man with high morals and God will honor the married woman. Pregnancy, and she will give birth to a beautiful, disease-free and healthy baby girl, and this vision also indicates the recovery of the patient and the achievement of many of the desires and goals that the opinion seeks in his future life. Interpretation of a dream about seeing figs in a dream for a married woman. Ibn Sirin says: If a married woman sees figs in a dream and eats them This vision indicates that she will get rid of all the worries and problems that the wife suffers from in her life, and when a married woman takes figs from her. Her husband in a dream, good skin for her with pregnancy soon and the fulfillment of all the wishes she wants to come true. Interpretation of a dream about seeing figs in a dream for a pregnant woman. Dream interpretation scholars say that when a pregnant woman dreams that she is eating and buying figs or that she has figs, this dream indicates that God will give her and honor her with a beautiful male child. Interpretation of a dream about seeing figs in a dream for a girl. If figs appear in a dream For an unmarried girl, this vision indicates kindness and a lot of money, and that she will enjoy stability and live a happy life full of happiness, and she will soon marry a generous man with high morals, and all that. She hopes to achieve success in her work and life. Interpretation of a dream about seeing figs in a dream: When a person sees dried figs in a dream, this indicates the abundance of halal money, and the dreamer will obtain a lot of money thanks to his success in his work. Interpretation of a dream about buying figs in a dream. Ibn Sirin says when a person sees Dreaming that he is buying figs in a dream, this vision indicates the good friendship of some of his friends and they were able to establish a new relationship that helps each other in all areas of life. Interpretation of the dream of seeing figs

title: Interpretation of a dream about a cat

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about a cat in a dream is a topic presented to you by the encyclopedia website to learn about the different interpretations of seeing a cat in a dream. The topic explains the interpretation of seeing a cat in several ways, such as: seeing a white cat, a black cat, a kitten, to see a pregnant cat, to see a wild cat, a witch cat and a dying black cat. ; This will be explained according to the interpretations of the most famous dream interpreters, such as: Al-Nabulsi and Ibn Sirin. Thus, this topic helps you learn the interpretations of many visions that occupy your mind. The Cat in a Dream Al-Nabulsi: Al-Nabulsi explained that seeing a black cat in a dream is because the person does not feel psychological comfort and satisfaction because there is something bad disturbing the tranquility of his life. Seeing a white cat means that the person feels... He is arrogant and arrogant and treats others poorly. Dreaming of a white cat, very beautiful and not interested in someone, means that there is unrequited admiration and attention. The dreamer is deceived by another person who is not really interested in him, but pretends to deceive him. Seeing a white wild cat indicates a person's inability to accept that some of his desires will not come true or that something unpleasant has happened to him. Seeing the same person killing a black cat means that he will be saved from Evil or his relationship with a deceitful person ends. Seeing a black cat in a dream means that the person is going through a difficult period in his life. Seeing a black cat walking towards someone means that he will meet a cunning person. Therefore, he must be careful to prevent harm to him. Dreaming of a dead black cat indicates that God will save a person from trouble or harm. Seeing a beautiful and well-cared-for cat indicates that a person is going through one of the most beautiful periods of his life. Seeing a single cat or a single cat in a dream means that a person who He who loves him is a deceiver and does not deserve one's love. Seeing a married man as a cat indicates that he is going through a period of marital discord. Seeing a small, pregnant white cat indicates that she will give birth to a beautiful girl, and her birth will be the beginning of many happy events in the life of the family. A cat in a dream by Ibn Sirin Seeing a black cat in a dream means that you are in danger of being harmed by others, as a black cat indicates the presence of a malicious person in the person’s life who insults him in any way, such as treating him dryly or making plans for him. Seeing a white cat indicates the presence of someone close to him. From a person's life, but this person is dishonest and works to deceive him. Al-Nabulsi interpreted a cat bite in a dream as an indication of the dreamer's illness, and if the cat is wild, then the illness will last a relatively long time, and it can also be a serious illness that is accompanied by many. Adversity. Selling a cat in a dream means losing money to varying degrees, and this can happen as a result of any reason, such as: failure in a project, exposure to fraud or excessive spending of money. A person’s dream of eating a cat indicates that he has learned magic. If a person sees himself turning into A cat, this indicates that a person’s life is in danger because of the presence of a person who is constantly watching him and eavesdropping on him. Seeing a cat entering the house indicates theft or the presence of hypocrites in a person’s life. Seeing a hungry cat explains that a person is going through a period of poverty, weakness, and need in his life. A dream about playing

title: What is the interpretation of a black bull in a dream according to Ibn Sirin?

preview.html: A dream about a black bull and its meaning. Interpretation of a dream about a black bull in a dream means strength, dexterity, and courage. Anyone who sees a black bull in a dream may be strong and may gain power, authority, influence, money, and high positions for himself and his family, and this will benefit all his loved ones. Seeing a black bull in a dream by Ibn Sirin When a fortuneteller is influential and sees a raging black bull in a dream, this indicates many The revolutions that occur this year, whether they are good revolutions or bad revolutions, and this is a message from God (Glory be to Him) to the ruler or president to make every effort to preserve the money and the circumstances of the ongoing changes. If the fortuneteller sees that he is riding a black bull, this is evidence On a lot of kindness and sustenance, and if the fortuneteller falls from the back of the black bull, this indicates that something unpleasant will happen to the fortuneteller, perhaps he will lose it. Beloved by family or friends, and perhaps loss of power, influence, and high positions, and perhaps failure or loss of power and money. If the dreamer falls from the back of the bull and then the bull slides to him on the ground, this is a sign of either imprisonment or death, and perhaps something essential in the dreamer’s life has been destroyed. A bull in a dream by Ibn Sirin. Ibn Sirin said that a bull in a dream indicates that the dreamer is a human being with a tongue that only utters sweet words that others like. Animals do not have the ability to pronounce words like humans, because they certainly have their own language, but what is strange is that if the dreamer sees in His dream is that the bull speaks in the dialect and language of humans, then the vision will be a sign of hostility with a man he knows. Bull horns have many meanings, so if the dreamer sees in a dream that the bull is without horns, this vision means that the dreamer is resourceful and his intelligence is limited, because he lacks physical and mental strength. So he will do it. He always finds humiliation and humiliation on his way. Ibn Sirin also confirmed that the bull is a sign of intercourse between spouses or the marriage of an unmarried woman to her husband soon. Seeing a black bull in a single woman’s dream means success and prosperity: This sign is specific to every virgin girl who saw a bull in her dream, but its color is white. Bright, this is a sign that she will find opportunities through which she can prove her ability to control things and achieve various successes. Another made it, to achieve this vision because there is no success without effort. Escaping from the husband: Many girls arrange their lives according to their priorities, and therefore the girl who sees a bull in her dream and resorts to escaping to stand before him and challenge or confront him, the interpretation will be a sign of her complete refusal to marry anyone. The young man at this time, may have set some special criteria for the boy of her dreams and so far he has not found her, or she has put before her eyes a series of goals that she seeks to achieve first before becoming a husband and mother. In any case, the dream reflects her attitude towards marriage in general. Wellness And physical strength: When seeing a bull riding in an unmarried woman’s dream, the interpreters gave her two indicators. The first evidence: If you dreamed of a black or yellow bull and approached it and climbed on its back without fear

The first evidence: If she dreams of a black or yellow bull and approaches it and climbs on its back without fear

title: Interpretation of a dream about the birth of Ibn Sirin and its most important meanings in the dream

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about Ibn Sirin’s birth and its most important meanings in the dream. We can define childbirth or childbirth as the process by which the fetus emerges from its mother’s womb and emerges into the outside world, and there is no doubt about that. After the pregnancy period, which is 9 months or 40 weeks, the fetus during pregnancy obtains its food and oxygen from its mother, and the birth process involves three stages, which are the dilation of the cervix, the descent of the child, and then the placenta’s exit from the mother’s womb. Interpretation of a dream about Ibn Sirin’s birth and its most important meanings in Dreaming: Seeing a woman’s labor and delivery in a dream is a natural circumstance, and the reason for this is due to many reasons, which are that the woman thinks a lot about childbirth and has many questions about childbirth, such as is it okay? Whether or not he will face severe pain during the birth process and other logical questions, and the interpretation of the dream of childbirth by Ibn Sirin and its most important meaning in the dream, Ibn Sirin agreed unanimously that seeing a dream of a ruler in a dream is one of the good dreams that bring joy and happiness and get rid of difficulties and hardships. The vision indicates that the dreamer is thinking During pregnancy, there is a fear of experiencing severe pain. If a pregnant woman sees this dream, the dream indicates that she is afraid that something bad will happen to her fetus or fetus. The birth of a healthy nature symbolizes nutrition, comfort, getting rid of stress and constant pressure, and achieving happiness. If an unmarried woman dreams of this The dream indicates that she is planning to get married and hopes to have young children, and the dream indicates that she wants to live a calm and stable life without quarrels, screaming and shouting. See also: Interpretation of a dream about the death of a brother in a dream and its most important indications about Nablus. Seeing childbirth in a dream for a married woman. Birth is one of the matters. Which is inevitable because women eventually want to have children, and it is worth noting that God created women’s bodies to endure times of pain more than men. Commentators unanimously agree that seeing a married woman giving birth brings humanity to her and her husband, because it brings them a lot of sustenance. And blessings. If the married woman suffers from problems in the uterus or reproductive system, the dream indicates her recovery. The dream indicates that the married woman will become pregnant soon and she must take a pregnancy test to confirm herself. Giving birth in a dream indicates the acquisition of material gains and material gains and indicates abundance of sustenance Which they will enjoy. The vision shows that the married woman is happy with her life and her husband and there are no problems that she suffers from. See also: Interpretation of a dream about a suitcase in a dream and its most important indications from Ibn Sirin and Nabulsi. Interpretation of a dream about an old woman giving birthWhen an old woman sees that she is giving birth, the dream raises her strangeness, such as how She gives birth while she is old, and there is no doubt that the dream contains many different interpretations. How will we list them in all transparency and objectivity, and the interpretation of the dream of giving birth to an old woman is as follows: Dream interpreters unanimously agree that seeing childbirth, whether it is a male birth, is a feminine dream that contains good content. The dream indicates that she will get rid of it

title: Learn more about the interpretation of seeing obesity in a dream from Ibn Sirin

preview.html: What you do not know about dreams of obesity: Seeing obesity in a dream is one of the visions that some people may have and they will certainly try to find a meaning for it, but these interpretations of it will differ from one vision to another. Interpretation of a dream about ghee in a dream If a person dreams that he is eating a group of different foods, but he feels... Having mistletoe and seeing it, it means that this person will have a lot of fun in the coming period by traveling on different enjoyable trips. If you see yourself carrying some ghee and pounding it a lot and quickly, this indicates that you will receive a sum of money in the form of an inheritance for one of your relatives who dies from God. Interpretation of ghee in a dream by Ibn Sirin: When a person sees in a dream that he has some mistletoe, but it is in excess, and it is in liquid form, this expresses that the dreamer will face a group of obstacles on his way to creating and forming a new project in order to expand the scope of living. If you see mistletoe In your dream in general, this is a sign of money that you will get very soon. Ghee in a dream for a single woman. For an unmarried girl to see in her dream that she is buying an amount of ghee, this means that she will soon be happy with the good news, which is that she will get married. If this single girl is not If a person dreams of having ghee. In his body, this indicates that this person is as close as possible to God, and has sufficient knowledge of jurisprudence, and a lot of information about religion. If one sees during his sleep that there is an amount of ghee in it, this expresses that this person will receive a lot of good news. And the blessed and happy ones that will grant his closeness and life in the coming short period. To reach the most accurate interpretation of your dream, search for the Egyptian Dream Interpretation website, which includes thousands of interpretations by leading interpretation scholars. Interpretation of a dream about eating mistletoe When you dream of an amount of ghee and you eat it, this vision indicates that you You will be able to get rid of the health problem that you are suffering from, if any. As for the person who sees himself eating some food in which he eats mistletoe, this expresses that this person is releasing a huge amount of latent energy within him by going to different places for entertainment and amusement. Seeing someone eating an amount of Of ghee, in addition to honey and a few pieces of bread, this indicates that this person will obtain a large amount of money in the form of spoils through the world of commerce in which he works. Interpretation of a dream about ghee for a pregnant woman: For a pregnant woman to see in a dream that she is eating an amount of ghee that she has, This means that she will be at her best, that she is strong and will be able to overcome many obstacles and obstacles that she faces in her life. If a pregnant woman dreams of buying an amount of ghee, this means that God will grant her a completely healthy child, free from any problem.

title: Interpretation of seeing stars in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of seeing stars in a dream, which is one of the promising dreams, is important because stars always bring pleasure and joy and herald the fulfillment of desires and goals. Therefore, seeing stars in a dream is always commendable and we will try to identify some meanings and interpretations of seeing stars in a dream. Ibn Sirin, either for a man, or for a single girl, or for a married woman for different scenes with stars. In a dream, it is like seeing stars shining in the sky, but we must assure you, dear reader, that you should not infer any interpretation that we will mention for any other vision you have seen, unless you consult a reliable dream interpretation scholar. .Read also: Palaces and the fruits of paradise in a dreamInterpretation of seeing stars in a dream by Ibn SirinInterpretation of seeing stars in a dreamThe dream interpretation scholar Ibn Sirin says that the interpretation of seeing stars in a dream in general foretells the happiness and joy that the dreamer will enjoy during the coming period - God willing -. Ibn Sirin also believes that stars in a dream indicate honor and honesty, and they also indicate good news when seeing stars in a woman's dream. Except for men who see stars in dreams, this is a sign of great fame that they gain or gain a lot of money, and God knows best.Read also: The toilet in a dreamSeeing stars in a single woman's dreamAn unmarried woman who sees stars in a dream indicates that there are some changes that will occur in the woman's life for the better - God willing -. Just as an unmarried girl sees stars at night in a dream, this promises her that she will be able to achieve what she wants in life - God willing. In addition to an unmarried girl seeing stars in a dream, this may be a sign of good news for her or a future marriage - God willing -. Seeing stars in a dream for a married womanA married woman sees stars in a dream, this indicates children And their good condition - God willing -. Just as a married woman sees bright stars in a dream, this indicates the marital bliss that this woman enjoys - God willing. In addition to the fact that a married woman sees stars at night in a dream, this means that she will be able to achieve what she wants. Read also: Pregnancy in a dream Seeing stars in a dream for a man A man who sees moving stars in a dream indicates that the ruler will leave the country, and God knows best. Like the stars falling on the house in a man's dream, this indicates the man's fear for his family, and God knows best. Just like a person who sees in a dream that stars are falling on his head, this indicates the dreamer's fear of death. As for stars falling to the ground in a dream, this indicates that the man is afraid of poverty. Seeing stars in a dream for a divorced woman A divorced woman who sees stars in a dream indicates the changes that will occur in her life, which will be happy changes that provide the woman with stability and peace - God willing -. Just like a divorced woman who sees stars at night in a dream, this indicates that she will be able to achieve her goals

title: Interpretation of a dream about washing your hair in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about washing hair in a dream Washing hair in a dream indicates repentance from sin and hearing good news, because it indicates the death of anxiety and distress. Cleaning dirt and oil secretion using shampoo because it makes hair more beautiful and increases its health and vitality, and hair is one of the blessings that God has given to man so that everyone can take care of it. Then follow us. Interpretation of a dream about washing hair for single women. We will tell you, through the points below, the interpretation of a dream about seeing showering for single women. When an unmarried girl sees that she has another girl washing her hair, the vision indicates that she will benefit from that girl. But when an unmarried girl sees a man washing Washing hair with dirt in Dreams portend the arrival of evil that must be avoided and resisted. Interpretation of a dream about washing hair for a married woman: Long hair indicates that she will live a rich life. As for a dream about washing short hair in a dream, it is evidence of the acquisition of illegal money. Interpretation of washing her hair with water and soap explains her happy married life or pregnancy. Imminent. Seeing a married woman washing her hair means that she and her husband are facing problems that lead to separation. Interpretation of a dream about washing hair for a pregnant woman. Washing a pregnant woman’s hair indicates her safety and the safety of her fetus. As for washing hair with foul substances, it indicates problems during pregnancy or childbirth. Interpretation of a dream about washing hair for a man is... Washing your hair with water in a dream is a sign of hearing good news and achieving success. But he must repent if he sees his hair washed with dirty materials. A dream about washing hair with shampoo indicates that a man will gain wealth in life. If a man is found bald while bathing, this indicates that he is suffering from Stress and illicit money. Washing hair with mud in a dream indicates that one will be happy throughout his life. Interpretation of a dream about washing hair for a boy. Interpretation of washing hair with milk and honey in a dream indicates that he will obtain a living and a lot of money. Seeing a single person washing his hair with soap and water indicates He is about to get married. Interpretation of a dream about washing hair for a student proves his success and excellence. Seeing hair washed with henna in a dream for an unmarried woman. Seeing henna washing a person’s hair means hearing good news. To dream of washing your hair with henna also means recovery from illness. Seeing yourself bathed with henna indicates decisions True. Seeing someone else’s hair washed in a dream for a single woman. Seeing hair washed in a dream is a promising vision. Seeing hair washed again indicates overcoming adversity and difficulties. It also indicates the cleansing of sins and misdeeds. Seeing hair washed with shampoo indicates relief and escape from worries. Also It indicates a departure from judgments and the nearness of joy and pleasure. At the end of this article, we explained to you detailed and comprehensive information about the above topic, which is the interpretation of a dream about bathing.

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about semolina in a dream in different situations Semolina is one of the types of flour that housewives use to make dough and sweets, and when you see semolina in a dream, it has a specific explanation and interpretation, and we will learn today in our article on the encyclopedia for more details. Interpretation of semolina in a dream: Semolina from Types of flour, and flour in a dream is a desirable dream. Semolina also indicates success in science, success in life matters, recovery from many diseases and knowledge of God. Whoever sees in his dream that he is kneading semolina flour, this is evidence of the dreamer’s travel, whether he or one of his relatives. Whoever sees in his dream that he is sifting semolina flour, this indicates that there are some problems that will be solved, God willing, and God knows best. Interpretation of a dream about semolina by Ibn Shaheen: Ibn Shaheen says that semolina flour in a dream shows a lot of sustenance and permissibility, which comes without fatigue, and shows integrity. Insight into religion and lifestyles. Whoever dreams that he is eating semolina flour, this indicates the emergence of poverty, and God knows best. Whoever dreams that he is selling semolina, this indicates that the dreamer is selling the afterlife with unwanted effects. Interpretation of a dream about semolina in a dream (by Al-Nabulsi): Al-Nabulsi said about The dream of semolina is that it is a provision from God, and that the woman who dreams of semolina flour shows her husband’s love for her and that she will reach the highest positions, and God knows best. What is the interpretation of semolina in a dream for one girl: If an unmarried girl dreams of semolina flour, this is great evidence of her great goodness, God willing. She will marry a rich, God-fearing man who will take her to the highest positions, and God knows best. . Whoever sees that he is sifting semolina, this is evidence of marriage, God willing, but he will face some problems and they will be solved, and God knows best. Interpretation of semolina in a dream for a married woman: Whoever sees in her dream that her husband brought her a large quantity of semolina flour, this is great evidence of vast blessings and sustenance from God, or she will give birth to a new baby, God willing. If she suffers from many marital problems, this indicates that these problems will be solved, God willing, and she will find stability, and God knows best. And whoever sees in her dream that she is storing semolina flour in bags, this is great evidence of a bright future, God willing. Whoever sees in her dream that she is giving flour to the poor, this indicates a good and beautiful person from God. God knows best. What is the interpretation of semolina for a pregnant woman: When a pregnant woman dreams of semolina flour, this is a good sign from God, and that she will give birth safely, and she and her child will be fine, God willing. And whoever sees that he is sifting semolina flour in a dream, this is strong evidence that the baby will be born beautiful. And in good health, because the sieve is a great sign of joy and happiness. And whoever sees that she is putting semolina in the bag, this indicates that she is pregnant with a male child and that knowledge is with God. Interpretation of a dream about semolina for a single man: Semolina in a dream indicates for a man that he will get a lot of money and work. In a trade and he succeeds in it. Semolina in a dream is evidence of a single man’s marriage to a beautiful girl with good morals and religion. To interpret a different dream, you can use the Live Dream Interpretation application.

Semolina in a dream is evidence of a single man’s marriage to a beautiful girl with good morals and religion. To interpret a different dream, you can use the Live Dream Interpretation application.

title: Interpretation of a dream about a store and a closet in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of seeing a store in a dream. Seeing a store in a dream is aimed at preserving secrets and possessions. Whoever dreams that he stores things in a place that no one knows about, this indicates the dreamer’s cunning. When a person sees that he is saving money, it shows his desire to do so. Collect and save money without spending. A warehouse in a dream indicates anxiety and fear that The dreamer feels it as a result of the failure of an emotional relationship or dishonesty at work. The meaning of seeing a closet in a dream for a pregnant woman: Seeing a closet in a pregnant woman’s dream depends on her interpretation of its condition and its shape. Whoever sees a clean and meticulous closet is an indication of the health of the fetus and the ease of its birth. If the matter is chaotic and disorganized, it will show health problems and a difficult birth. Seeing a kitchen drawer indicates the birth of a female. The closet or cupboard symbolizes giving birth to a male. Seeing the closet in a dream for a married woman. The woman who dreams of a beautiful wardrobe. The arrangement indicates the stability of the family. If the pigs are unclean, this indicates marital disputes. Everyone who was late in giving birth dreamed of a children’s wardrobe, which is a sign of Appearance Pregnancy. Interpretation of seeing a wardrobe in a dream for a single woman. The basement in an unmarried woman’s dream is a sign of the feelings hidden in it, either from contentment, or from stupidity, or from love, or from hatred. When she sees a wardrobe full of beautiful and clean clothes, it indicates her stable and calm life. As for the clothes of traitors, they are torn. And impolite, this symbolizes the difficulties that the girl is going through. Anyone who sees a wardrobe with a white dress indicates engagement and marriage very soon. Regarding a black dress in the fiancée’s closet, it indicates separation and annulment of the engagement. The meaning of seeing a kitchen cabinet in a dream. A person who dreams of a kitchen cabinet and he only owns bread. It is an indication of the difficulty of living financially. And everyone who sees his wardrobe full of fruitful things returns to abundance in his life. As you see an empty kitchen cabinet, it completely indicates the difficulty of the pioneer’s material and moral life. Add the dream that you would like to interpret, with reference to the marital status, in a comment below the article, and we will respond to it and clarify it.

title: Interpretation of seeing broken molars in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of seeing molars breaking in a dream. I dreamed that my molars broke one after the other. I dreamed that my molars broke into small pieces. I saw my molars breaking and falling into my hand. All of these dreams were coming to us for a long period of time, and there is no doubt that these dreams have many Of the symbols and clues, we learn about them today through this encyclopedia article. Interpretation of seeing molars in a dream: The molars in a dream are the dreamer’s old family and his relatives in reality, as the upper molars refer to the dreamer’s father’s family, while the lower molars are his maternal family. Interpretation of seeing broken molars In a dream: This vision can bring good news of an upcoming livelihood for the pioneer or money for the household, and it can bring warning of misfortunes, death, or the loss of a loved one or relative, God forbid. Scientists say that whoever sees his tooth in a dream broken and in debt, it is good news that he will be repaid. His debt, and if he has a trust, he returns it to its owner. An indication of the dreamer’s great life. The upper molar breaks in a dream: In Ibn Sirin’s interpretation, if the upper molar breaks and falls into the hands of the fortuneteller, it means that there is money on the way to him, but if his tooth breaks and falls into his lap, then he will have a male child, but if The tooth broke and fell to the ground, meaning the misfortune of death. The lower molar broke in a dream: Ibn Sirin says in this regard: Whoever finds in a dream that his lower tooth broke and fell and he owes a debt, he will do well to repay it. A broken tooth that has decayed in a dream: indicates caries. Teeth indicate the dreamer's anxiety about contracting a disease, and if the dreamer finds that his decayed tooth has been treated in the dream, this means that his problems are about to end, but if he finds his decayed tooth broken, this means that... He will get rid of his suffering. Interpretation of seeing broken molars in a dream for a man: If a man sees that his molars are broken, this indicates the death of a member of his family, family, or relatives. However, if blood oozes or he feels pain when the molars are broken, this indicates a failure or loss at work. On the other hand, molars falling out and then being picked up or falling onto the dreamer's lap can indicate longevity or living longer than the residents of the house. A sign that his family will precede him in death. Interpretation of a dream about a broken tooth for an unmarried woman: If a single woman sees that her teeth are falling out, this is a sign that she is going through a period of confusion, anxiety, and depression and it may be a sign of the shock that she will be exposed to in her life. Interpretation of a dream about a broken tooth For a married woman: Seeing molars breaking in a dream for a married woman may be a warning about the illness of the husband or one of the children, but if her molars break and fall into her lap, it is a sign of the presence of many offspring or the birth of males. Interpretation of a dream about a broken tooth for a pregnant woman: Losing a tooth in a pregnant woman means that her fetus will be mentioned, God willing. In general, when interpreting a dream, it is necessary to know the dreamer’s feeling during the dream and the state he was in in order to determine the interpretation accurately and carefully. To interpret a different dream, you can Use the Live Dream Interpretation app
